content.p: Prior to the expiration of a term of guardianship or conservatorship, the limited guardian, guardian, limited conservator, or conservator may petition, pursuant to , for a renewal of his appointment for a period not to exceed five (5) years. The petition shall be accompanied by verified affidavits of a physician, an advanced practice registered nurse or physician assistant working within his or her scope of practice, or a psychologist licensed or certified under the provisions of KRS , or a person licensed or certified as a social worker or an employee of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services who meets the qualifications of , (b), and (c) or 1)(a), (b), and (c), supporting the need for the continuation of the guardianship or conservatorship.
